properties.comment: This query returns request MD5 related queries.
properties.entry: select id,md5_pool_large,md5_pool_small, (SELECT COUNT(*) from ASSET_REPLICA.DBO.batchjobs with(NOLOCK) WHERE storage_id=sl.id and job_type='MD5_LARGE' and job_status='NEW') CURRENT_MD5_LARGE , (SELECT COUNT(*) from ASSET_REPLICA.DBO.batchjobs with(NOLOCK) WHERE storage_id=sl.id and job_type='MD5_SMALL' and job_status='NEW') CURRENT_MD5_SMALL from ASSET_REPLICA.DBO.storage_locations sl where id=:storagelocationId

select top 1 1 FROM ASSET_REPLICA.DBO.assets A WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN ASSET_REPLICA.DBO.policies P WITH(NOLOCK) ON p.id=a.policy_id INNER JOIN ASSET_REPLICA.DBO.asset_instances ai WITH(NOLOCK) ON AI.asset_id = A.ID WHERE A.DELETE_DATE is null AND ai.storage_location_id=:storagelocationId AND STATUS='N' AND p.md5_check = 1
select id from ASSET_REPLICA.DBO.storage_locations where physical_name=:storageName
select physical_name from ASSET_REPLICA.DBO.storage_locations where id=:storageId

select top 1 1 from ASSET_REPLICA.DBO.assets a WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE a.DELETE_DATE is null AND EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM ASSET_REPLICA.DBO.asset_instances ai WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE last_check is not null and last_check < ((CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - :md5RecheckDuration) AND ai.status ='V' and ai.asset_id = a.id and ai.storage_location_id=:storagelocationId)

declare @OUTPUT_RECS TABLE( job_id int, asset_instance_id int, storage_id int, request_host_name nvarchar(100) ) insert into ASSET_REPLICA.dbo.batchjobs( job_type , asset_instance_id , storage_id -- What goes here, the FPD storage ID or source t1? , start_date , job_status --, job_detail -- N/A - FPD ID for request goes here with an update after request is initiated , request_host_name -- N/A for FPD Tier2 copy. ) output inserted.job_id, inserted.asset_instance_id, inserted.storage_id, inserted.request_host_name--, ai.last_check, ai.status, a.filesize --path! INTO @OUTPUT_RECS select TOP 1 -- Monster Select Goes Here. CASE WHEN a.filesize <= SIZE_CUTOFF.MAX_SMALLFILESIZE THEN 'MD5_SMALL' else 'MD5_LARGE' END as job_type , AI.ID AS ASSET_INSTANCEID , SL.ID as storage_id , GETDATE() as start_date , 'NEW' as job_status , ? as request_host_name FROM ASSET_REPLICA.dbo.asset_instances AI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN ASSET_REPLICA.dbo.assets A WITH(NOLOCK) on AI.asset_id=A.id INNER JOIN ASSET_REPLICA.dbo.policies P on A.policy_id=P.id INNER JOIN ASSET_REPLICA.dbo.storage_locations SL on AI.storage_location_id=SL.id ,------- CURRENT MD5 Processing Pool Levels ----- (select SL_jobs.id as POOL_STORAGE_ID , SL_jobs.md5_pool_large as TOTAL_POOL_LARGE , SL_jobs.md5_pool_small as TOTAL_POOL_SMALL , sum( case when ( bj1.job_type='MD5_LARGE' and bj1.job_status='NEW') then 1 else 0 end) as CURRENT_MD5_LARGE , sum( case when ( bj1.job_type='MD5_SMALL' and bj1.job_status='NEW') then 1 else 0 end) as CURRENT_MD5_SMALL from ASSET_REPLICA.dbo.storage_locations SL_jobs LEFT OUTER JOIN ASSET_REPLICA.dbo.batchjobs bj1 WITH(NOLOCK) on SL_jobs.id=bj1.storage_id and bj1.storage_id=? and bj1.job_type in ('MD5_LARGE','MD5_SMALL') and bj1.job_status='NEW' where SL_jobs.id=? group by SL_jobs.id, SL_jobs.md5_pool_large, SL_jobs.md5_pool_small) POOL_LEVELS ,-------- DICTIONARY VALUE FOR Max Small filesize for determining job type ---------- (select min(CONVERT(int,dct.value)) as MAX_SMALLFILESIZE from ASSET_REPLICA.dbo.dictionary dct where dct.dictionary='CONFIG' and dct.keyname='SMALL_FILESIZE') SIZE_CUTOFF WHERE A.DELETE_DATE IS NULL and -- Both types: -- There must be room in the pool for this asset (based on asset size) -- not a currently running job or an error at least an hour old -- on the correct storage location ( /* Small Files */ (A.filesize <= SIZE_CUTOFF.MAX_SMALLFILESIZE and POOL_LEVELS.CURRENT_MD5_SMALL <POOL_LEVELS.TOTAL_POOL_SMALL) or /* Large Files */ (A.filesize > SIZE_CUTOFF.MAX_SMALLFILESIZE and POOL_LEVELS.CURRENT_MD5_LARGE < POOL_LEVELS.TOTAL_POOL_LARGE) ) and SL.id=? and ai.asset_id not in ( select ai_jobs.asset_id from ASSET_REPLICA.dbo.batchjobs bj_list WITH(NOLOCK) inner join ASSET_REPLICA.dbo.asset_instances ai_jobs WITH(NOLOCK) on bj_list.asset_instance_id=ai_jobs.id where bj_list.job_type in ('MD5_SMALL','MD5_LARGE') and ( bj_list.job_status='NEW' or (BJ_list.JOB_STATUS='ERROR' AND BJ_list.END_DATE > DATEADD(HOUR,-1,GETDATE()))))
and -- Policy requires md5 (p.active=1 and p.md5_check=1) and ( -- Type 1 - New Assets that need an MD5 -- Status N AI.status='N' -- Type 2 - Assets older than 90 days that could use refresher. -- instance has an MD5 (status V) -- Asset instance last check date is old or ( (dateAdd(DAY,?,ai.last_check) < GETDATE()) and ai.status='V' ) ) ORDER BY AI.ID DESC select job_id,asset_instance_id from @OUTPUT_RECS

SELECT (SELECT PATH FROM ASSET_REPLICA.dbo.STORAGE_LOCATIONS SL WHERE SL.ID=:storageId) + A.FS_PATH as path FROM ASSET_REPLICA.DBO.ASSETS A WITH(NOLOCK), ASSET_REPLICA.DBO.ASSET_INSTANCES AI WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE A.ID=AI.ASSET_ID AND AI.ID=:assetInstanceId
select path from ASSET_REPLICA.DBO.storage_locations where id=:storageId
select fs_path from ASSET_REPLICA.DBO.assets where id=:assetId

select ai.asset_id as asset_id, ai.id as id, a.user_md5 as user_md5, a.asset_md5 as asset_md5 from ASSET_REPLICA.dbo.asset_instances ai WITH(NOLOCK), ASSET_REPLICA.dbo.batchjobs b, ASSET_REPLICA.dbo.assets a WITH(NOLOCK) where a.id=ai.asset_id and ai.id=b.asset_instance_id and b.job_id=:job_id
update ASSET_REPLICA.dbo.assets set asset_md5=:asset_md5 where id=:assetId
update ASSET_REPLICA.dbo.asset_instances set status=:status, location_md5=:location_md5, last_check=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id=:instanceId

select policy_id as policy_id,folder_pattern as folder_pattern from ASSET_REPLICA.dbo.dam_folders where repository=:repository and folder_pattern COLLATE Latin1_General_CS_AS like :lPath order by len(folder_pattern) desc
select policy_id as policy_id,folder_pattern as folder_pattern from ASSET_REPLICA.dbo.dam_folders where repository=:repository order by len(folder_pattern) desc
